874160.name: Block Heads: Instakill - Extras Skin Pack
874160.description:
Unlock more customization options for Block Heads: Instakill. Featuring new skins, sounds, guns, and kill styles! With a focus on the outlandish aspects of everyday life.

  • 21 NEW Skins, each with 3 variations, including: Pilot, English Guard, Karate Master, Sailor, Weight Lifter.
  • 8 NEW Hats: Fire Fighter Hats, Caps, and Pilot Hats.
  • 1 NEW Outfit with 3 variations: "Bonk".
  • 2 NEW Guns: Only the elite will use these babies.
  • 21 NEW Gun Sounds: Lasers and Sci-Fi galore.
  • 3 NEW Kill Styles: Who doesn't like a little no-gravity and transumtation?
